Posted By: blindthrall (4/29/2010 6:30:13 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
[Vicious Hunger](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vicious Hunger) is not better, its different.  
This is more splashable and instant speed, whereas Hunger can't affect combat at all, is less splashable, but is cheaper overall.
posts.html:
Vicious Hunger is not better, its different.
This is more splashable and instant speed, whereas Hunger can't affect combat at all, is less splashable, but is cheaper overall.
Report Abuse  
Posted By: HairlessThoctar (5/14/2010 9:06:04 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
@blindthrall - Actually I would pick this over [Vicious Hunger](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vicious Hunger) because this is Instant speed, but really lets just cut into this card. The reason this wasn't used in vamp decks is because between [Disfigure](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Disfigure) and splashing red for [Lightning Bolt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lightning Bolt) and [Pyroclasm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Pyroclasm) vamps didn't need this as removal.   
  
[Disfigure](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Disfigure) alone already does what this did, at a cmc of 1. Don't gain life? Who cares, that adds nothing to how the field is affected so extra mana for that is pretty much useless.
posts.html:
@blindthrall - Actually I would pick this over Vicious Hunger because this is Instant speed, but really lets just cut into this card. The reason this wasn't used in vamp decks is because between Disfigure and splashing red for Lightning Bolt and Pyroclasm vamps didn't need this as removal.

Disfigure alone already does what this did, at a cmc of 1. Don't gain life? Who cares, that adds nothing to how the field is affected so extra mana for that is pretty much useless.
